## Names.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Names` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(reservedWordsList: string, opt_variablePrefix?: string);
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

reservedWordsList


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

A comma-separated string of words that are illegal for use as names in a language (e.g. 'new,if,this,...').


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_variablePrefix


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Some languages need a '$' or a namespace before all variable names (but not procedure names).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
